headline: Marjorie Taylor Greene's word soup: Republican Rep. compares Capitol cops to the 'Gazpacho' police after colleagues accused officers of illegal raiding their offices during January 6 probe
author: Katelyn Caralle
sentences: Marjorie Taylor Greene accidentally used the word 'gazpacho' – which is a cold Spanish soup – when meaning to accuse House Speaker Nancy Pelosi of using Capitol Police as Nazi 'gestapos' to spy on GOP lawmakers.The Republican Georgia congresswoman insisted in an interview with One America News on Wednesday that United States Capitol Police (USCP) are being used as 'political pawns' and Pelosi is 'sending them into our offices' to take pictures and snoop around.She said Pelosi is also having them probe visitors who want to meet with members of Congress.

The same people here and elsewhere that are harping on MTG for her word gaffe are the same people who probably think that Sandy Cortez, Cory Bush, Hank Johnson, Maxine Waters, Nancy Pelosi and Kevin McCarthy are geniuses.

Spending four hours listening to her discuss the goings-on on the house floor and interact with Tim and the crew on other topics allowed me to understand that she's actually an intelligent and sincere human being.

They seldom mention when Dementia Joe spews word salad in press conferences or speeches... greyseal
